attributes.action: Make sure all Housing Authority Homes are supplied withCarbon Monoxide Alarms and all new builds have these as standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see all council and association homes with a Gas Supply. given  Carbon Monoxide alarms as standard.
Also all new builds whether they are council or private have Carbon Monoxide alarms as standard
I nearly lost my daughter and grandchildren due to Carbon Monoxide and feel that these are alarms are important to every home
